definition: broken/damaged/worn out/lousy/rotten/to break, split or cleave/to get rid of/to destroy/to break with/to defeat/to capture (a city etc)/to expose the truth of
to decrease/to lose/to damage/to harm/(coll.) to speak sarcastically/to deride/caustic/mean/one of the 64 hexagrams of the Book of Changes (䷨)

sentences.english: Do not accept if clear band around bottle neck & cap is damaged or missing.
sentences.chinese: 如果瓶口或是瓶盖的密封破损或是丢失，请不要使用。

sentences.english: The Shipper and the Chief Officer are discussing the torn bags of castor seeds at the Dispatch Office.
sentences.chinese: 发货人跟大副正在调度室谈论蓖麻籽袋子破损的事。

sentences.english: A number of bags are worn out to a certain extend with contents leaking badly.
sentences.chinese: 许多袋子都有一定程度的破损且内货严重外漏。

sentences.english: A single filter bag dust collector and tank wall friction damage.
sentences.chinese: 单个有过滤袋和除尘器箱壁磨擦破损的。

sentences.english: What happens if an implant ruptures?
sentences.chinese: 如果假体破损了，会发生什么？

sentences.english: Cable structure can prevent the water into the motor when the cable skin damaged.
sentences.chinese: 电缆线结构可以防止电缆表皮破损时水进入电机中。

sentences.english: Now take your unworn items and start swishing.
sentences.chinese: 现在拿着那些还未破损的衣服，开始去与别人互换。

sentences.english: In this paper, the damage mechanism of Zn leaching cinder volatile kiln lining is studied.
sentences.chinese: 本文对锌浸出渣挥发窑窑衬破损机理进行了系统研究。

sentences.english: No, I'm sorry, the value of a broken card cannot be refunded.
sentences.chinese: 不好意思，破损卡的工本费就不能退了。

sentences.english: Worn clothing and feed roller bearings.
sentences.chinese: 针布破损和给棉罗拉轴承坏。

sentences.english: Kevlar fiber helps to strengthen the cable and prevent breakage.
sentences.chinese: 芳纶纤维有助于增强有线和防止破损。

sentences.english: Although some of the watches had been partially stripped.
sentences.chinese: 尽管这部分表已部分破损。

sentences.english: Hoses to hydrants in main deck cut.
sentences.chinese: 右甲板连到消防栓皮龙管破损。

sentences.english: Please don't apply it on impaired skin and avoid entering eyes.
sentences.chinese: 请勿涂于皮肤破损处，防止入眼。

sentences.english: Can I have the value of the card refunded?
sentences.chinese: 不好意思，破损卡的工本费就不能退了。

sentences.english: Do not take if tamper-evident seal is broken or missing.
sentences.chinese: 如果不采取防揭封条破损或丢失。

definition: to cause damage to/to ruin/to destroy
to split open/to dehisce (of fruit or cotton bolls, to split open)
to drop off/to come off/to lose (hair etc)/to omit (a character when writing)
to age (of person or object)/becoming old
